# Example Repo for `markdown-magic`

This repo demonstrates how markdown magic works. [View the raw `README.md`](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DavidWells/repo-using-markdown-magic/master/README.md) file to see the comments needed for `markdown-magic` to, well, do it's magic.
